content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I know your name to get started with scheduling your plumbing service?
Nice to meet you, Linda! Could you please provide your address so I can check if you are in our service area?
Thank you, Linda. I’m having trouble verifying your address in our system. Let me check again..
I’m sorry, I’m unable to confirm that address. I will escalate this to a human operator for assistance. Please hold on.

Hello Linda, this is Edgar from XYZ Home Services. I understand there was an issue confirming your address. Could you please provide the full address including city and zip code to help me assist you?
Oh, sure Edgar. It’s 1234 Elm Street, Springfield, 98765.
Thank you for that information, Linda. Unfortunately, it looks like Springfield is outside of our service area. I’m sorry we can’t provide service at your location.
If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
